w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Dropdown Button
w:HTMLPanel.p: "A dropdown button is a button with a contextual menu for displaying lists of links with eventual titles and dividers.
w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Basic usage
w:HTMLPanel.p: Add any of NavLink, DropdownHeader or NavDivider to the context menu.

c:StaticCode.pre: <w:ButtonDropdown label="Dropdown button" type="PRIMARY" size="LARGE"> <w:DropdownHeader label="First Header"/> <w:NavLink label="Layout"/> <w:NavDivider/> <w:DropdownHeader label="Second Header"/> <w:NavLink label="Component"/> <w:NavLink active="true" label="Overview"/> </w:ButtonDropdown>

w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Icon customization
w:HTMLPanel.p: With the iconType property, add an icon to the dropdown. The label is not mandatory.

c:StaticCode.pre: <w:ButtonDropdown iconType="VIEW" label="Dropdown button" type="PRIMARY" size="LARGE"> <w:DropdownHeader label="First Header"/> <w:NavLink label="Layout"/> <w:NavDivider/> <w:DropdownHeader label="Second Header"/> <w:NavLink iconType="USERS" label="Component"/> <w:NavLink active="true" label="Overview"/> </w:ButtonDropdown> <w:ButtonDropdown iconType="VIEW" type="PRIMARY" size="LARGE"> <w:DropdownHeader label="First Header"/> <w:NavLink label="Layout"/> <w:NavDivider/> <w:DropdownHeader label="Second Header"/> <w:NavLink iconType="ADD" label="Component"/> <w:NavLink active="true" label="Overview"/> </w:ButtonDropdown>
